article_title: What's cancelled in N.B. because of COVID-19
article_description: The spread of COVID 19 worldwide has forced closures and cancellations of events in New Brunswick  Here is an updated list
article_content: The spread of COVID 19 worldwide has forced closures and cancellations of events in New Brunswick  Here is an updated list The spread of COVID 19 worldwide has led the New Brunswick Health Department to recommend postponing or cancelling events involving mo   9221 chars
